name: Pigeon Pooper 2D
description:
Story

Barty is a flightless pigeon who's recently discovered a brand new way to get airborne! You have 20 seconds to help Barty leave his mark on the city. Use food to your advantage and look for hidden targets!

Ready? Poop!

Info

Created as part of the 20 Second Game Jam.

I've been meaning to learn a "real" game engine for a long while instead of constantly making my own for every new game. Godot is the engine I chose to learn and Pigeon Pooper 2D (an original idea from my father that I've been meaning to make for years) is my first real game programmed in a real engine. Pigeon Pooper 2D was a fun project to make and the juvenile theme helped me not take it too seriously and instead focus on getting something out the door while learning Godot's basics.

"I'm a pooper, you're a pooper, wouldn't you like to be a pooper too? Be a pooper. Play Pidgeon Pooper!"
